a.n: Sheryl Crow - Miles From Memphis Live

p.d: Filmed in November 2010 in the palatial surroundings of the wonderful art deco Pantages Theatre in Hollywood, this concert film captures Sheryl Crow on tour in support of her recent hit album "100 Miles From Memphis". The set pulls tracks from across her career and is peppered with hit singles and her best loved album tracks as well as highlights from the new album. Sheryl Crow is at the top of her form and is backed by an outstanding band. Combine this with simple but elegant staging and atmospheric lighting and everything is set for a perfect evening in the company of an exceptional artist.
